analyzed: karṇa parva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_8.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
hate droṇe kurukṣetre punar abhyetya saṃjayaḥ
rājñe nyavedayat yuddham āścaryam karṇa pārthayoḥ
tatas duryodhanaḥ karṇam citta saṃkalpa śālinam

original: cakre drauṇigirā hṛṣṭaḥ śūraṃ senāsu nāyakam // Bhmj_8.3 //
analyzed: cakre drauṇi girā hṛṣṭaḥ śūram senāsu nāyakam
abhiṣiktaḥ maṇi mayaiḥ kalaśaiḥ yaśasām nidhiḥ
manoratha sudhā varṣī saḥ bhavat kuru bhūpateḥ
vidhāya makara vyūham sthitaḥ vairi kuleṣu saḥ
cakrire pāṇḍavāḥ vyūham ardhacandram atandritam
tatas śastra astra saṃgharṣa kīrṇa vahni kaṇā ākule
ghore pravṛtte samare nirdhoṣaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
kuñjara ārūḍhaḥ matta mātaṅgam āsthitam
catur dantam jaghāna ugram kulūta nṛpatim raṇe
tatas karṇa anta nirmuktaiḥ karṇa cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
nirbhinnāḥ kuñjarāḥ petuḥ chinna pakṣāḥ iva acalāḥ
pārtha sātyaki pāñcāla draupadeya śikhaṇḍinaḥ
kṛpa drauṇi mukhaiḥ cakruḥ param navam iva āharam
pārthaḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā nināya bhrātarau nṛpau

original: daṇḍādhāraṃ sadaṇḍaṃ ca daṇḍādhārapuraṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_8.10 //
analyzed: daṇḍa ādhāram sa daṇḍam ca daṇḍa ādhāra puram śaraiḥ
atha pāṇḍyaḥ kuru camūm dārayan jagatībhujām

original: bhallaiḥ śirāṃsi ciccheda labdhalakṣyaḥ prahāriṇām // Bhmj_8.11 //
analyzed: bhallaiḥ śirāṃsi ciccheda labdha lakṣyaḥ prahāriṇām
bhīṣma droṇa arjuna spardhām darpa jvara bhavām nayaḥ
sahate nityam ātmānam manyamānaḥ bala adhikam
lāṭī netra śita astreṇa tena bāṇaiḥ nipīḍitā
drauṇinā sūtapūtreṇa saubalena kṛpeṇa ca
vāryamāṇā api dudrāva kuru rāja varūthinī
tam abhyetya javāt drauṇiḥ viśikha aśani varṣiṇam
ayodhayat asaṃbhrāntaḥ jambhāriḥ iva śambaram
tasya līlāvatī lola locana bhramara ambujam
drauṇiḥ śiraḥ jahāra atha bhallena āndeli kuṇḍalam
pāṇḍya saṃjñe hate vīre mauli ratne mahībhujām

original: pāṇḍusenā na śuśubhe śaśihineva śarvarī // Bhmj_8.17 //
analyzed: pāṇḍu senā na śuśubhe śaśi hinā iva śarvarī
pāṇḍya vadhaḥ
tatas gāḍha niṣakteṣu śastra vṛṣṭim
āviṣṭeṣu iva vīreṣu yudhi māneṣu a vāritam

original: miśrībhūteṣu bhūpānāṃ ratheṣu ca gajeṣu ca /
analyzed: miśrībhūteṣu bhūpānām ratheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
naṣṭa ālokeṣu lokeṣu vapuḥ gāḍhena pāṃsunā
mleccha rājam mahā anīkam nakulaḥ krūra yodhinam
jaghāna rākṣasa ācāram sarva āyudha viśāradam
vimarde nibiḍe tasmin nakulam vadha gocaram
smaran kuntī vacaḥ karṇaḥ na avadhīt satya vikramaḥ
tatas karṇa mukhaiḥ vīraiḥ kīrṇāḥ pāñcāla sṝñjayāḥ
na lebhire paritrāṇam kuravaḥ ca arjuna ādibhiḥ
hata vīreṣu bhagneṣu chinna dhvaja ratheṣu ca
gāḍha viddha sravat danti ghaṭā niṣpiṣṭa pattiṣu
akāṇḍa tāṇḍava āviddha kabandha ākula vartmasu
viśāla śoṇita nadīm añjat kuñjara vājiṣu
hata śeṣeṣu sainyeṣu śrānteṣu kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
avahāram dina apāye cakruḥ śithila kārmukāḥ
prathamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
atha prabhāte saṃnaddhe saṃnikṛṣṭe bala dvaye

original: ūce duryodhanaṃ karṇaḥ pāṇḍusenāṃ vyalokayan // Bhmj_8.26 //
analyzed: ūce duryodhanam karṇaḥ pāṇḍu senām vyalokayan
tvad prasāda praṇayinaḥ mānasya vibhavasya ca

original: adyāhamanṛṇo bhūtvā raṇe gacchāmi nirvṛtim // Bhmj_8.27 //
analyzed: adya aham anṛṇaḥ bhūtvā raṇe gacchāmi nirvṛtim
adya gāṇḍīvadhanvānam hatvā sāram bhavat dviṣām

original: saphalaṃ te karomyeṣa saṃkalpaṃ cirasaṃbhṛtam // Bhmj_8.28 //
analyzed: saphalam te karomi eṣa saṃkalpam cira saṃbhṛtam
nindyam sarva ātmanā loke satām sva guṇa kīrtanam

original: kiṃtu kartavyakāleṣu na praśaṃsanti mūkatām // Bhmj_8.29 //
analyzed: kiṃtu kartavya kāleṣu na praśaṃsanti mūka tām
aham abhyadhikaḥ pārthāt vidyayā vikrameṇa ca
etāvat adhikam kṛṣṇaḥ yat anarghaḥ sya sārathiḥ
kṛṣṇāt abhyadhikaḥ śalyaḥ viditaḥ sarva bhūbhujām
tena sārathinā jiṣṇum vijetum aham utsahe
iti vaikartanena ukte hṛṣṭaḥ rājā suyodhanaḥ
tat eva abhyetya vinayāt madra rājam abhāṣata
tatas madra adhipaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrambha lulita aṃśukaḥ
sa asūyam vīkṣya rādheyam kaurava adhipam abhyadhāt
aho sarala tā rājan avamānāya kevalam
yat aham dīrgha saṃghābhyām sārathye gaditaḥ tvayā
kim aham pāṇḍavān sarvān hantum śakte na saṃgare

original: nṛpaṃ māṃ sūtaputrasya sūtaṃ kartuṃ yadicchasi // Bhmj_8.35 //
analyzed: nṛpam mām sūtaputrasya sūtam kartum yat icchasi
uktvā iti sahasā śalye sa anuge hantum udyate
prasādya tam kuru patiḥ vaktum samupacakrame
madra rāja saṃrambham asthāne kartum arhasi
adhikaḥ tvam hi govindāt atas smābhiḥ iha arthyate
arjunāt adhikaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sārathiḥ vihitaḥ paraiḥ

original: tvaṃ karṇādadhikastasmātsārathye mā haṭhaṃ kṛthāḥ // Bhmj_8.38 //
analyzed: tvam karṇāt adhikaḥ tasmāt sārathye mā haṭham kṛthāḥ
trailokya upaplave daityaiḥ prajāpati vara ūrjitaiḥ
rājata āyasa sauvarṇa svacchanda pura vāsibhiḥ
vadhyamāneṣu lokeṣu devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ

original: purā pinākinaṃ devaṃ śaṃkaraṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_8.40 //
analyzed: purā pinākinam devam śaṃkaram śaraṇam yayuḥ
viśva trāṇāya viśveśaḥ tridaśaiḥ arthitaḥ tatas

original: sarvadevamayaṃ kṛtvā rathaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca sāyakam // Bhmj_8.41 //
analyzed: sarva deva mayam kṛtvā ratham viṣṇum ca sāyakam
uvāca devān saṃnaddhaḥ sārathiḥ kalpyatām mama
mad prabhāva adhikaḥ kaścid yena hantāsmi dānavān

original: tataḥ śakramukhā devā vicārya suciraṃ dhiyā /
analyzed: tatas śakra mukhāḥ devāḥ vicārya su ciram dhiyā
brahmāṇam viśva kartāram sārathye paryakalpayan
tena uṅkāra pratodena gṛhīte syandane haraḥ
ekībhūtān pure daityān dadāha viśikha agninā
tripura vadha upākhyānam
iti rudrasya dhātā api svayam sūtaḥ bhavat purā

original: tathā tvamapi karmasya nāvajñāṃ kartumarhasi // Bhmj_8.45 //
analyzed: tathā tvam api karmasya na avajñām kartum arhasi
aiśvaryasya abhijanyasya guṇānām vikramasya ca

original: santaḥ phalaṃ hi manyante mitrapraṇayapūraṇam // Bhmj_8.46 //
analyzed: santaḥ phalam hi manyante mitra praṇaya pūraṇam
ukte duryodhanena iti madra rājaḥ smita ānanaḥ
svacchanda vādī sūtaḥ ham bhaviṣyāmi iti abhāṣata
śalya sārathya svīkāraḥ
tatas sva kalpitaiḥ śvetaiḥ turaṅgaiḥ iva mātaliḥ
tapta kāñcana saṃnāhe karṇasya rucire rathe
jagrāha helayā śalyaḥ raśmim amālām su śikṣitām
pratāpa dhāmnaḥ sūryasya divi iva garuḍāgrajaḥ
yuyutsum karṇam ālokya dhanvinam śalya sārathim

original: jayaṃ hastagataṃ mene kururājaḥ sahānugaḥ // Bhmj_8.50 //
analyzed: jayam hasta gatam mene kuru rājaḥ saha anugaḥ
nadaḥ tu kuru sainyeṣu śaṅkha dundubhi niḥsvanaiḥ
maurvīm āsphālayan karṇaḥ madra rājam abhāṣata

original: adya śakraḥ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā nihatamarjunam /
analyzed: adya śakraḥ sutam dṛṣṭvā mayā nihatam arjunam

original: divyāstreṣu dṛśaḥ śaṅke sāsūyaṃ kṣipati kṣaṇāt // Bhmj_8.52 //
analyzed: divya astreṣu dṛśaḥ śaṅke sa asūyam kṣipati kṣaṇāt
adya mad bāṇa dalitam pārtham vīkṣya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
bhīṣma droṇa vadha āyāsa vaiphalyāt paritapyatām
iti bruvāṇam rādheyam karṇa madra adhipaḥ bravīt

original: mā sūtaputra mithyaiva pralāpaṃ śiśuvatkṛthāḥ // Bhmj_8.54 //
analyzed: mā sūtaputra mithyā eva pralāpam śiśu vat kṛthāḥ
gandharva samare pūrvam tvayi dhīmati vidrute
yena trailokya vīreṇa kauravāḥ parirakṣitāḥ
māninām ātta śastra bhāṇām tasmin gograha vigrahe
yuṣmadvidhānām sahasā hṛtā yena aṃśuka āvalī
ākhaṇḍalaḥ sa anucaraḥ khāṇḍave yena nirjitaḥ

original: taṃ samutsahase jetuṃ karṇa karṇo 'si kiṃ na vā // Bhmj_8.57 //
analyzed: tam samutsahase jetum karṇa karṇo si kim na vā
iti śalyena sahasā śalyena iva arditaḥ muhur

original: saṃstambhya kopaṃ rādheyo drakṣyasīti tamabhyadhāt // Bhmj_8.58 //
analyzed: saṃstambhya kopam rādheyaḥ drakṣyasi iti tam abhyadhāt
tatas vyūheṣu anīkeṣu savyasāci raṇa utsukaḥ

original: agresaro rathāgryāṇāṃ karṇaḥ papraccha sainikān // Bhmj_8.59 //
analyzed: agresaraḥ ratha agryāṇām karṇaḥ papraccha sainikān
kva asau jayadratha arātiḥ vīraḥ vānaraketanaḥ

original: taṃ vinā rabhasādete tāmyantyeva mameṣavaḥ // Bhmj_8.60 //
analyzed: tam vinā rabhasāt ete tāmyanti eva mama iṣavaḥ
vidhatte locana patham mama yaḥ tūrṇam arjunam

original: dadāmi tasmai vāsāṃsi citrāṇyābharaṇāni ca // Bhmj_8.61 //
analyzed: dadāmi tasmai vāsāṃsi citrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca
rathān sa matta mātaṅgān gāḥ suvarṇam purāṇi ca
kāntāḥ ca vividham ca anyat draviṇam yāvat icchati
etat ākarṇya sa utprāsam babhāṣe madra bhūpatiḥ

original: hāso duḥkhāya jāyeta rādheya tvadviceṣṭitaiḥ // Bhmj_8.63 //
analyzed: hāsaḥ duḥkhāya jāyeta rādheya tvad viceṣṭitaiḥ
mūmūrṣuḥ iva niṣputraḥ draviṇam cira saṃbhṛtam
a vicārya eva kim mohāt pareṣu tyaktum icchasi
svayam arjunam āyāntam vaśaḥ sita saṭā bharam

original: draṣṭāsi bāṇanakharaiḥ kuraṅga iva kātaraḥ // Bhmj_8.65 //
analyzed: draṣṭāsi bāṇa nakharaiḥ kuraṅgaḥ iva kātaraḥ
śrutvā etat kupitaḥ karṇaḥ jagāda bhrukuṭī mukhaḥ

original: nirguṇastvaṃ na jānīṣe na māṃ na ca dhanaṃjayam // Bhmj_8.66 //
analyzed: nirguṇaḥ tvam na jānīṣe na mām na ca dhanaṃjayam
aham eva arjunam jāne pratimallam pinākinaḥ

original: sa ca māṃ vetti tattvena tvaṃ mithyā tu pragalbhase // Bhmj_8.67 //
analyzed: sa ca mām vetti tattvena tvam mithyā tu pragalbhase

original: ayaṃ mitropadhiḥ śatruḥ kenāpi preṣito 'si naḥ /
analyzed: ayam mitra upadhiḥ śatruḥ kena api preṣitaḥ si naḥ
ku deśa jasya vā nā etat tava kauṭilyam adbhutam
madrakāḥ kutsita ācārāḥ satya śīla ārjava ujjhitāḥ

original: mānaṃ pracakṣate loke sarvavedavido janāḥ // Bhmj_8.69 //
analyzed: mānam pracakṣate loke sarva veda vidaḥ janāḥ
nirlajjāḥ sarva gāminyaḥ lobha moha mada ākulāḥ

original: anāryā madrikāyāstāḥ svasāro mātaraśca te // Bhmj_8.70 //
analyzed: anāryāḥ madrikāyāḥ tāḥ svasāraḥ mātaraḥ ca te
rādheyena iti saṃrambhāt bhāṣitaḥ madra bhūpatiḥ

original: uvāca mūḍha bahuśo hitamuktaṃ na budhyase // Bhmj_8.71 //
analyzed: uvāca mūḍha bahuśas hitam uktam na budhyase
smartāsi vigalat darpaḥ nirjitaḥ savyasācinā
hita upadeśa vākyānām śocan anuśaya ākulaḥ
samudra kūla nilayaḥ purā vaiśyaḥ mahādhanaḥ
bahu apatyaḥ bhavat rājñā rakṣitaḥ nirupadravaḥ
tad putrāṇām abhūt kākaḥ satata ucciṣṭa bhojanaḥ

original: puṣṭāṅgo yo dhanāḍhyānāṃ praṇayī putravatpriyaḥ // Bhmj_8.74 //
analyzed: puṣṭa aṅgaḥ yaḥ dhana āḍhyānām praṇayī putra vat priyaḥ
tatas kadācid āyātāḥ haṃsāḥ mānasa gāminaḥ

original: so 'vadajjātasaṃgharṣastulyā yūyaṃ na me jave // Bhmj_8.75 //
analyzed: saḥ vadat jāta saṃgharṣaḥ tulyāḥ yūyam na me jave
jāne pāta śatam pūrṇam viḍīna uḍḍīna bhedataḥ

original: jñāyate tulyapātānme yuṣmākaṃ ca tarasvitā // Bhmj_8.76 //
analyzed: jñāyate tulya pātāt me yuṣmākam ca tarasvi tā
iti ucchiṣṭa bhujā tena rājahaṃsāḥ vivalgitāḥ
āhūtāḥ vihasantaḥ ntar vīrāḥ no kiṃcid ūcire

original: ekastu haṃso jaladhau vrajāva iti saṃvidā /
analyzed: ekaḥ tu haṃsaḥ jaladhau vrajāvaḥ iti saṃvidā
kākena sārdham śara vat nipapāta smita ānanaḥ
tena vāta javena abdhau vāyasaḥ khe vrajan samam
sa ca krośa ardha mātre ti vihvalaḥ
tena eva tīre nyastaḥ kṛpāvatā
rakta ṣṭhīvī cirāt prāpa saṃjñām jñāta khaga antaraḥ
haṃsakākīyam   /
evam tvam api rādheya kauravaiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: arjunaṃ samare prāpya hīnadarpo bhaviṣyasi // Bhmj_8.81 //
analyzed: arjunam samare prāpya hīna darpaḥ bhaviṣyasi
śrutvā etat madra rājena kathitam marma dāraṇam
ūce vaikartanaḥ vīraḥ pṛthu kopaḥ pi avikriyaḥ

original: yuṣmadvidhānāṃ vacasā jāyate na bhayaṃ mama /
analyzed: yuṣmadvidhānām vacasā jāyate na bhayam mama

original: paśyārjunaṃ mayā śalya samare vinipātitam // Bhmj_8.83 //
analyzed: paśya arjunam mayā śalya samare vinipātitam

original: lakṣyābhyāse mayā vatsaḥ purā bāṇena dāritaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣya abhyāse mayā vatsaḥ purā bāṇena dāritaḥ
pracchannaḥ taru khaṇḍena homadhenoḥ dvijanmanaḥ
tad śāpāt ratha cakram me paryantam sādhayiṣyati
iti etat chidram ekam me durjayaḥ hamataḥ nyathā

original: tvaṃ tu kevalayānena nṛpeṇa vāhinā vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tvam tu kevala yānena nṛpeṇa vāhinā vṛtaḥ

original: mayā svayaṃ saṃnikarṣe dvijihvaḥ kuṭilo vṛtaḥ // Bhmj_8.86 //
analyzed: mayā svayam saṃnikarṣe dvijihvaḥ kuṭilaḥ vṛtaḥ
madrakāṇām ku vṛttānām pāpa deśa nivāsinām
tīrtha ācāra vihīnānām adhipaḥ si kim ucyate
abhakṣyam bhuñjate nityam a pātavyam pibanti ye

original: agamyāsu ramante ca te madrāstava bāndhavāḥ // Bhmj_8.88 //
analyzed: agamyāsu ramante ca te madrāḥ tava bāndhavāḥ
sarva sādhāraṇāḥ yoṣāḥ sarva bhakṣyāḥ dvijātayaḥ
sarva pātaka saṃpṛktāḥ madrāḥ yeṣu bhavān nṛpaḥ
madra kutsanam  /
iti karṇena gadite madra rājaḥ u pi abhāṣata
karṇa rājā tvam aṅgānām mātulya tyāga pāpinām

original: vikrīyante sadā yatra dārāḥ putrāśca mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: vikrīyante sadā yatra dārāḥ putrāḥ ca mānavaiḥ

original: tasminpraṇetā viṣaye naivaṃ me vaktumarhasi // Bhmj_8.91 //
analyzed: tasmin praṇetā viṣaye na evam me vaktum arhasi
aṅga kutsanam
iti ukte madra rājena coditāḥ te turaṅgamāḥ

original: dārayanta iva kṣoṇīṃ jātapakṣā ivodyayuḥ // Bhmj_8.92 //
analyzed: dārayantaḥ iva kṣoṇīm jāta pakṣāḥ iva udyayuḥ
athā adṛśyata śubhra aśvaḥ jiṣṇuḥ acyuta sārathiḥ
agre samagra sainyānām vyagraḥ śatru nibarhaṇe
tatas pravṛtte vīrāṇām samare prāṇa hāriṇi

original: dhanuṣāṃ kūjatāṃ śabde chādite tūryaniḥsvanaiḥ // Bhmj_8.94 //
analyzed: dhanuṣām kūjatām śabde chādite tūrya niḥsvanaiḥ
uvāca śalyaḥ rādheyam dhanaṃjaya raṇa utsukam
paśya gāṇḍīvadhanvānam bhindānam kuru vāhinīm
ete saṃśaptakāḥ pārtha śara śreṇī śata arditāḥ
hata dvipa ghaṭā kūṭa kuṭīṣu nibhṛtam sthitāḥ
paśya arjuna śara utkṛtta kaṇṭhānām mauktika āvalī
patitāḥ bhūmipālānām aśru mālāḥ iva śriyaḥ
iti madra adhipena ukte kva yāsyati dhanaṃjayaḥ
mad bāṇa gocaram yātaḥ harṣāt iti avadat nṛpaḥ
tatas vaikartana śaraiḥ pūrite bhuvana udare
cakampe pāṇḍava anīkam vātaiḥ iva mahat vanam
dhṛṣṭadyumna mukhān vīrān kurvāṇaḥ virathān muhur
ayutāni kṣaṇāt karṇaḥ vīrāṇām avadhīt daśa
cedi māgadha pāñcāla sainye bhagne yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
mahā rathaiḥ anugataḥ rādheyam ādravat
rāja vallabha vāc yuddham nā idam yatra pragalbhase
iti uktvā dharmatanayaḥ śaraiḥ karṇam apūrayat
atha karṇaḥ narapateḥ cakrarakṣau mahā rathau

original: hatvā śarairunmamātha dhvajaṃ cāpaṃ cakarta ca // Bhmj_8.103 //
analyzed: hatvā śaraiḥ unmamātha dhvajam cāpam cakarta ca
tatas śaktim niśāta agrām kāla daṃṣṭrām iva utkaṭām
prāhiṇot sūta vṛtrāya sa nirhnādām yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: bhittvā vaikartanaḥ śaktiṃ tāṃ ghaṇṭākrandinīṃ muhuḥ /
analyzed: bhittvā vaikartanaḥ śaktim tām ghaṇṭā ākrandinīm muhur

original: jātarūpamayaṃ varma cakarta nṛpateḥ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_8.105 //
analyzed: jātarūpa mayam varma cakarta nṛpateḥ śaraiḥ
muhūrtam tam samāpūrya chinna varmāṇam āśugaiḥ
danta varṇān jaghāna asya kṛṣṇa bālān turaṅgamān
vidrutam dharmatanayam dṛṣṭvā krodhī vṛkodaraḥ
karṇam parāṅmukham cakre śaraiḥ aśani dāruṇaiḥ
duryodhana anujān vīrān āyātān bhrātuḥ ajñayā
vidadhe vipulaiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhīmaḥ preta pura āśrayān
nanda upanandau durdharṣam dhanurgrāham mahā bhujam
jarāsaṃdham śrutarvāṇam durdinam sa niṣaṅgiṇam

original: pāśahastaṃ kavacinaṃ krodhaṃ ca sa mahābhujam /
analyzed: pāśahastam kavacinam krodham ca sa mahā bhujam
hatvā praviśya pṛtanām nāga anīkam apothayat
tatas sātyaki pāñcāla mādrī suta yudhiṣṭhirāḥ
ayodhayan karṇa mukhyān tasmin su bhaṭa saṃkṣaye
vṛṣasena mukhaiḥ vīraiḥ bhidyamāne bala arṇave
udabhūt caṇḍa gāṇḍīva dhvaniḥ āghaṭṭita ambaraḥ
hatvā saṃśaptakān sarvān pratyāvṛtte dhanaṃjaye
āvarta nartitā iva abhūt sahasā kuru vāhinī
bhagne suśarma pramukhe pārtha astraiḥ nṛpa maṇḍale
karṇaḥ pāṇḍava sainyeṣu kāla līlāyitam vyadhāt
ayutāni gaja indrāṇām sapta hatvā tarasvinām

original: tāvantyeva rathānāṃ ca cakre bhūmibhujāṃ kṣayam // Bhmj_8.115 //
analyzed: tāvanti eva rathānām ca cakre bhūmibhujām kṣayam
vyāghraketum jayam śaṅkum rudram ugrāyudham param

original: siṃhasenaṃ rocamānaṃ śuktaṃ citrāyudhaṃ harim // Bhmj_8.116 //
analyzed: siṃhasenam rocamānam śuktam citrāyudham harim
devāpim jiṣṇukarmāṇam śalabham citra daṇḍakau
anyān ca bhūmipān hatvā pāñcāla kadanam vyadhāt
vadhyamāne tha karṇena vidīrṇe ca sahasradhā

original: babhūva pāṇḍave sainye ghoro vyatikaro navaḥ // Bhmj_8.118 //
analyzed: babhūva pāṇḍave sainye ghoraḥ vyatikaraḥ navaḥ
karṇena droṇaputreṇa kṛpeṇa kṛtavarmaṇā
kirīṭinā pārṣatena śaineyena śikhaṇḍinā

original: kupitena ca bhīmena te sene pravidārite /
analyzed: kupitena ca bhīmena te sene pravidārite
babhūvatuḥ viprakīrṇe vidhvasta kavaca āyudhe
divya astra varṣiṇam drauṇim divya astreṇa eva phalguṇaḥ
jitvā dadarśa karṇena vadhyamānān mahā rathān
tam abravīt madhuripuḥ vismitaḥ karṇa avikramāt
paśya kaunteya karṇa astra vahni dagdhām varūthinīm
paśya kāla kaṭākṣeṇa lakṣitaḥ sūtanandanaḥ

original: kaṭākṣeṇa madādhmātaḥ sārathye māṃ yadaikṣata // Bhmj_8.123 //
analyzed: kaṭākṣeṇa mada ādhmātaḥ sārathye mām yadā aikṣata

original: kṣaṇena nikhilāṃ syūtāṃ tāṃ senāṃ kurute nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇena nikhilām syūtām tām senām kurute nṛpaḥ
paśya asya śara jālena nīrandhreṇa āvṛtāḥ diśaḥ
iti uktvā keśavaḥ tūrṇam rathena ghana nādinā
nināya śakratanayam bhīmasena ratha antikam
tatas bhīma girā dhyātvā dharmarājam dhanaṃjayaḥ
karṇa sāyaka nirbhinnam prayātam śibiram śanais
niḥśvasan bhṛśa saṃtaptaḥ kesarī iva tala āhataḥ

original: prayayau bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ saha kāliyavidviṣā // Bhmj_8.127 //
analyzed: prayayau bhrātaram draṣṭum saha kāliyavidviṣā
sa hema puṅkhaiḥ nirbhinnam karṇa nāma aṅkitaiḥ śaraiḥ
śayānam dharmatanayam dadarśa chinna kaṅkaṭam
tasya abhivādya caraṇau niṣaṇṇau keśava arjunau
cintā saṃtāpita tanū tasthatuḥ kṣaṇam ākulau
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tam vijñāya karṇam hatvā samāgatam
utthāya nirvyathaḥ harṣāt jayāt apṛthu vismayaḥ
prāyas niḥśeṣitāḥ senāḥ yena astra dahanena naḥ

original: sa diṣṭyā samare pārtha tvayā karṇo nipātitaḥ // Bhmj_8.131 //
analyzed: sa diṣṭyā samare pārtha tvayā karṇaḥ nipātitaḥ

original: vīrāḥ sa vidviṣāṃ hantā dhaureyaḥ sarvadhanvinām /
analyzed: vīrāḥ sa vidviṣām hantā dhaureyaḥ sarva dhanvinām

original: rāmaśiṣyastvayā brūhi kathaṃ vaikartano hataḥ // Bhmj_8.132 //
analyzed: rāma śiṣyaḥ tvayā brūhi katham vaikartanaḥ hataḥ
iti pṛṣṭaḥ nṛpatinā babhāṣe śvetavāhanaḥ
yudhyamānasya su ciram drauṇinā rudra tejasā
saṃśaptakaiḥ ca vighanaḥ bhūt mama karṇa nipātane
bhīmasenam avasthāpya pratyanīke mahā bhujam
prahāra vikṣatam deva tvām aham draṣṭum āgataḥ
adhunā tvad anujñātaḥ kauravāṇām parāyaṇam
kathā śeṣam karo pi eṣa karṇam karṇa āyataiḥ śaraiḥ
iti bruvāṇam bibhatsum mogha saṃkalpa duḥkhitaḥ
uvāca sāyaka ākīrṇaḥ kopa taptaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: bhāraṃ vinyasya vipulaṃ bhīmasene dhanurdharaḥ // Bhmj_8.137 //
analyzed: bhāram vinyasya vipulam bhīmasene dhanuḥ dharaḥ
apayātaḥ u si karṇasya satyam dṛṣṭvā parākramam

original: mithyaiva kuntyā garbhe tvaṃ kṣatriyavyañjano dhṛtaḥ // Bhmj_8.138 //
analyzed: mithyā eva kuntyāḥ garbhe tvam kṣatriya vyañjanaḥ dhṛtaḥ
pūrakaḥ putra saṃkhyāyām bāṇaḥ tṛṇa mayaḥ yathā

original: trayodaśa samāste te saṃkalpā vihitāstvayi // Bhmj_8.139 //
analyzed: trayodaśa samāḥ te te saṃkalpāḥ vihitāḥ tvayi
sarve prayātāḥ vaiphalyam upakārāḥ iva adhame

original: ka eva nāma jānīte karṇādbhīto dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_8.140 //
analyzed: kaḥ eva nāma jānīte karṇāt bhītaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
apayāsyati saṃgrāmāt yaḥ varteta tathā vidhim
etat prayaccha kasmaicid gāṇḍīvam śaurya śāline
samare karṇa saṃtrāsam yaḥ smākam apaneṣyati
etat ākarṇya bībhatsuḥ marmaṇi iva samāhataḥ

original: etadgirā dadau khaḍge kruddhaḥ sāśrulavā dṛśaḥ /
analyzed: etad girā dadau khaḍge kruddhaḥ sa aśru lavāḥ dṛśaḥ

original: taṃ kopasaṃkaṭo ghore duḥkhāgnau ca nirantare // Bhmj_8.143 //
analyzed: tam kopa saṃkaṭaḥ ghore duḥkha agnau ca nirantare
patitam vīkṣya govindaḥ sarvavyāpī tam abhyadhāt

original: jāne te hṛdgataṃ pārtha yena dolāyase muhuḥ // Bhmj_8.144 //
analyzed: jāne te hṛdgatam pārtha yena dolāyase muhur

original: gāṇḍīvaṃ vitarānyasmai tvāṃ brūyādyaḥ sa te dhruvam /
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam vitara anyasmai tvām brūyāt yaḥ sa te dhruvam

original: vadhya ityucitācāra pratijñā tava viśrutā // Bhmj_8.145 //
analyzed: vadhyaḥ iti ucita ācāra pratijñā tava viśrutā
tad artham asi kopa andhaḥ nihantum kim svid agrajam
ātmānam vā vrata bhraṃśa bhayāt khaṅgam nirīkṣase
śruyatām atra satyena kevalena vimuhyase
dharma adharmau na jānīṣe satya mātra dṛḍha vrataḥ
asatyam dharma tām yāti satyam āyāti adharma tām
kadācid karma bhedena tat vicāryam dhiyā budhaiḥ

original: dharmo 'pi gahanaḥ sūkṣmo jñāyate na yathā tathā /
analyzed: dharmaḥ pi gahanaḥ sūkṣmaḥ jñāyate na yathā tathā

original: purā babhūva vipine balāko nāma lubdhakaḥ // Bhmj_8.149 //
analyzed: purā babhūva vipine balākaḥ nāma lubdhakaḥ
ghora sattvam kadācid sa go brāhmaṇa gaṇa antakam
hatvā śareṇa sahasā śakra lokam avāptavān
kauśikaḥ nāma vipraḥ prāc satya vākya kṛta vrataḥ

original: vidrutāndhanikānpṛṣṭo dasyubhiḥ kva gatā iti // Bhmj_8.151 //
analyzed: vidrutān dhanikān pṛṣṭaḥ dasyubhiḥ kva gatāḥ iti
adarśayat satya vādī sa tān guṇa dayā āśrayān
dṛṣṭān ca dasyavaḥ jaghnuḥ tūrṇam tān draviṇa āśayā
kauśikaḥ pi atha kālena patitaḥ narakam yayau

original: ityevaṃ gahanā pārtha pravṛttiḥ satyadharmayoḥ // Bhmj_8.153 //
analyzed: iti evam gahanā pārtha pravṛttiḥ satya dharmayoḥ
tasmāt tvam agraje rājñi dharma niṣṭhe yudhiṣṭhire
mohāt asāṃpratam kiṃcid na cintayitum arhasi
śrutvā etat khaḍgam ākṛṣya hantum ātmānam udyatam
pratijñā bhaṅga nirbhinnam pārtham kṛṣṇaḥ bravīt punar
avamānena nihataḥ guruḥ bhavati sarvathā

original: bhavatyātmā ca nihataḥ ślāghayā gurusaṃsadi // Bhmj_8.156 //
analyzed: bhavati ātmā ca nihataḥ ślāghayā guru saṃsadi
rakṣan pratijñām ajñānam nirasya krodha saṃbhavam
tasmāt etad vadhāya adya nivṛttaḥ bhava phalguṇa
iti uktavati dāśārhe tathā iti uktvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
bhīruḥ pramādī krūraḥ tvam iti uvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
mayā ekena hatāḥ sarve saṃhatāḥ daitya dānavāḥ
dhuryaḥ ham kārmuka bhṛtām iti ātmānam uvāca ca
tatas dharmasutam duḥkhāt kānanam gantum udyatam
yatnāt prasādayāmāsa gṛhītvā caraṇau hariḥ
pārtham ca pāda patitam sa aśru netram yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
rurodha gāḍham āliṅgya vigalat manyu viplavaḥ
kṛta śaucau tatas vīrau dharmarāja dhanaṃjayau
rathau āruhya saṃnaddhau jagmatuḥ samara aṅgaṇam
atha arjuna śara vrāta kṛtta vaktraiḥ nareśvaraiḥ

original: kṣaṇaṃ babhūva patitaiḥ sā kabandhamayīva bhūḥ // Bhmj_8.163 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam babhūva patitaiḥ sā kabandha mayī iva bhūḥ
atrā antare bhīmasenaḥ hatvā duryodhana anujān
duḥśāsanam yudhyamānam āsasāda ibha vikramam
niṣpiṣya gadayā tasya ratham sa aśva āyudha dhvajam

original: ācakarṣa raṇe dhvastaṃ taṃ hiḍimbāpatirbalāt // Bhmj_8.165 //
analyzed: ācakarṣa raṇe dhvastam tam hiḍimbāpatiḥ balāt
priyā paribhavam ghoram smaran atha vṛkodaraḥ
prakopa rākṣasa āviṣṭaḥ koṣṇam śoṇitam āpapau
ghoram tat karma bhīmasya dṛṣṭvā srasta asi kārmukāḥ
trastāḥ mahā rathāḥ sarve mīlita akṣāḥ ākampire
asṛj prasara garvitaḥ pulaka daṇḍa gaṇḍa ānanaḥ madāt ati viśṛṅkhalaḥ skhalita pāda cāra kramaḥ
babhau bhaya da vibhrama bhramita bhīma bhāsvat gadaḥ priyā cikura saṃyama udyata matiḥ samīra ātmajaḥ
apūrveṇa eva vidhinā hate duḥśāsane tathā
mahatām api bhūtānām abhūt kaṇṭakitā tanuḥ
atrā antare pāṇḍavānām vṛṣasena śara ardite

original: sainye babhūva nirghoṣaḥ patatāṃ gajavājinām // Bhmj_8.170 //
analyzed: sainye babhūva nirghoṣaḥ patatām gaja vājinām
saṃhatāḥ api bhūpālāḥ bhīma sātyaki rakṣitāḥ

original: na sehire raṇe dīptaṃ karṇasūnoḥ parākramam // Bhmj_8.171 //
analyzed: na sehire raṇe dīptam karṇa sūnoḥ parākramam
sa sātyakim bhīmasenam mādrī putrau kirīṭinam
dhṛṣṭadyumnam nṛpāḥ ca anyān vīraḥ tulyam ayodhayat
āścarya yodhinaḥ tasya smayamānaḥ iva arjunaḥ
bhujau śiraḥ ca ciccheda kamalā kamala upamam
vṛṣasena vadhaḥ
vṛṣasene hate karṇaḥ puras gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
sasmāra sa aśru nayanaḥ saubhadram bahubhiḥ hatam
atha amarṣa ājya siktena bhrukuṭī dhūma ketunā
krodha agninā dahyamānaḥ karṇaḥ dhāvat dhanaṃjayam
manoratha śata abhyaste pravṛtte samare tayoḥ
babhūva kautuka āyāta sura siddha ākulam nabhaḥ
karṇa arjuna raṇe tasmin sva putra jaya śaṃsinoḥ

original: jāte vivāde sahasā divi sūryasurendrayoḥ/ bhmj_8.177 //
analyzed: jāte vivāde sahasā divi sūrya surendrayoḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ dvidhā sthitaiḥ devaiḥ vṛṣāṅka kamalodbhavau
kṛṣṇaḥ yatra jayaḥ tatra iti ūcatuḥ niścitam purā
atha gambhīra nirghoṣau śaṅkhau karṇa kirīṭinau

original: dadhmatuḥ śauriśalyau ca yaiścakampe jagattrayī // Bhmj_8.179 //
analyzed: dadhmatuḥ śauri śalyau ca yaiḥ cakampe jagat trayī
tatas dhavala pakṣa agrāḥ sva yaśobhiḥ iva aṅkitāḥ
vaikartanaḥ pāṇḍavāya prāhiṇot viśikha āvalīḥ
pārtha dhvajena abhihataḥ karṇa ketuḥ akampata
kṛṣṇasya dṛś tri bhāgaḥ ca śalyam śalyam iva āviśat
atha arjuna śaraiḥ dikṣu pūryamāṇāsu saṃtatam
bāṇa pātam atikramya tasthuḥ kaurava sainikāḥ
duryodhana prayuktānām rādheya ratha rakṣiṇām
mahā rathānām vaktrāṇi jahāra atha kapidhvajaḥ
asaṃbhrāntaḥ tatas karṇaḥ muṣṭi mūle kirīṭinaḥ
prayujyamānam asakṛt ciccheda śara maṇḍalam
tatas bhīmaḥ bravīt pārtham acyutaḥ ca ati vismitaḥ

original: durjayaḥ samare karṇaḥ sthiro yudhyasva phalguṇa // Bhmj_8.185 //
analyzed: durjayaḥ samare karṇaḥ sthiraḥ yudhyasva phalguṇa
kairāte khāṇḍave vīra kālakeya vadhe vā
yaḥ bhavat tava saṃrambhaḥ gṛhāṇa abhyadhikam tatas
etat ākarṇya vijayaḥ vellat mukhara kaṅkaṇaḥ
gāḍham ākṛṣya gāṇḍīvam divya astraiḥ dyām apūrayat
bhārgava astreṇa hatvā tām astra vṛṣṭim kirīṭinaḥ

original: taṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca karṇo bāṇairapūrayat // Bhmj_8.188 //
analyzed: tam ca bhīmam ca kṛṣṇam ca karṇaḥ bāṇaiḥ apūrayat
tatas karṇa śara āsāraiḥ arjuna astraiḥ ca sarvatas
pāṇḍu kaurava senāsu babhūva vipulaḥ kṣayaḥ
atha sarpa mukham dīptam kīrṇa candana śālinam
astram karṇaḥ mahā bhogam prāhiṇot savyasācinaḥ
visṛṣṭe bhujage tasmin śalyaḥ ṅga patim abhyadhāt

original: nāyaṃ prāpnoti pārthasya kaṇṭhaṃ nāgastvayeritaḥ // Bhmj_8.191 //
analyzed: na ayam prāpnoti pārthasya kaṇṭham nāgaḥ tvayā īritaḥ
punar saṃdhāna yogyaḥ te rādheya yadi manyase
akarṇo syatha vā karṇa hita vākyeṣu sarvadā
iti tejaḥ vadhāya uktaḥ śalyena tapanātmajaḥ

original: uvāca dvirna saṃdhatte karṇa ityamalāśayaḥ // Bhmj_8.193 //
analyzed: uvāca dvis na saṃdhatte karṇaḥ iti amala āśayaḥ
karṇa cyutam mahā ghoram āpatantam viṣa ulbaṇam
vyālam dṛṣṭvā hariḥ cakre vapuḥ mandara gauravam
jānubhiḥ vasudhām yāte tatas haya catuṣṭaye

original: phaṇī jagrāha namrasya kirīṭāgraṃ kirīṭinaḥ // Bhmj_8.195 //
analyzed: phaṇī jagrāha namrasya kirīṭa agram kirīṭinaḥ
kirīṭa khaṇḍe patite muktā ratna aṭṭahāsini
saḥ viśat vasudhām sarpaḥ vipralabdhaḥ viniḥśvasan
tatas kṛṣṇa arjunau vidhyan kāla daṇḍa upamaiḥ śaraiḥ
karṇaḥ sṛṣṭaiḥ unnanāda hasan muhur
atha śakrasutaḥ kopāt divya ratna virājitam
varma ciccheda karṇasya śaraiḥ ca apūrayat vapuḥ

original: khāṇḍave kṛtavairaṃ taṃ khaṃ vrajantaṃ mahoragam /
analyzed: khāṇḍave kṛta vairam tam kham vrajantam mahā uragam

original: chittvā ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ pārthaḥ karṇaṃ punaratāḍayat // Bhmj_8.199 //
analyzed: chittvā ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ pārthaḥ karṇam punar atāḍayat
vaikartanena nihate brahmāstre śākram arjunaḥ
prāduścakre vighātāya vajra aśani śata ākulam

original: hatvā tamastraṃ rādheyo jyāṃ ciccheda kirīṭinaḥ /
analyzed: hatvā tam astram rādheyaḥ jyām ciccheda kirīṭinaḥ

original: kṣaṇādabhinavāṃ maurvī vidadhe ca dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_8.201 //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt abhinavām maurvī vidadhe ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
tatas raudram sphurat jvālā jaṭālam saṃdadheḥ junaḥ
astram yena abhavat vyoma ghora digdāha bhīṣaṇam
atrā antare mahī svayam ratha cakram vidheḥ vaśāt
jagrāha samaye tasmin aṅga rājasya saṃgare
tatas tat cakram uddhartum udyataḥ viṣama sthitaḥ

original: uvāca karṇaḥ kaunteyaṃ muhūrtaṃ kṣamatāṃ bhavān // Bhmj_8.204 //
analyzed: uvāca karṇaḥ kaunteyam muhūrtam kṣamatām bhavān
uddhṛte smin mayā cakre mahā astram muñca phalguṇa

original: vyasanasthe viśastre ca nahi śūrā bhavādṛśaḥ // Bhmj_8.205 //
analyzed: vyasana sthe viśastre ca nahi śūrāḥ bhavādṛśaḥ
etat śrutvā avadat karṇam hasan kāliya sūdanaḥ

original: diṣṭyādya karṇa jānīṣe dharmaṃ vīravrate sthitaḥ // Bhmj_8.206 //
analyzed: diṣṭyā adya karṇa jānīṣe dharmam vīra vrate sthitaḥ

original: bahubhirnihato bālaḥ saubhadraḥ kiṃ nu vismṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bahubhiḥ nihataḥ bālaḥ saubhadraḥ kim nu vismṛtaḥ
gaṇyatām tat ca yat kṛṣṇām sabhāyām uktavān asi
viṣa vahni pradāneṣu chinna dharmaḥ smṛtaḥ tvayā

original: nūnaṃ vipadi nīcānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ dharmavṛttayaḥ // Bhmj_8.208 //
analyzed: nūnam vipadi nīcānām nṛpāṇām dharma vṛttayaḥ
ukte janārdanena iti manyunā prajvalan iva
brahmāstram karṇa vihitam brāhmeṇa vijayaḥ vadhīt
āgneyam arjuna utsṛṣṭam vāruṇena aṅga bhūpatiḥ
astreṇa astram samāhṛtya grasta cakraḥ vyalambata
athā unmamātha bāṇena dhvajam kanaka bhāsvaram
karṇasya ākhaṇḍala sutaḥ manoratham iva unnatam
tatas ñjalikam ādāya śaram kāñcana bhūṣitam
abhimantrya samākṛṣya mṛtyu daṃṣṭra sita ānanam
rudra ādayaḥ stra guravaḥ tuṣṭāḥ me tapasā yadi
tat anena ripum hanyām iti uktvā sṛjat arjunaḥ
nirbhinnaḥ tena sahasā kaṇṭhe hāra pariṣkṛte
rādheyaḥ krakaca utkṛtta hema tālaḥ iva apatat
hate dhanuṣmatām dhurye kaurava anīka nāyake

original: karṇe drutaṃ yayau śalyaḥ śalyayanhṛdayānanam // Bhmj_8.215 //
analyzed: karṇe drutam yayau śalyaḥ śalyayan hṛdaya ānanam
prāptam rathena śūnyena dṛṣṭvā madra nareśvaram

original: hato duryodhanaḥ karṇo jīvatītyūcire nṛpāḥ // Bhmj_8.216 //
analyzed: hataḥ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ jīvati iti ūcire nṛpāḥ
duryodhanaḥ rjuna śaraiḥ aṅga rāje nipātite
uttamāṅge iva ajñāsīt na kiṃcid vihata undriyaḥ
tejaḥ tatas tarala dīdhiti karṇa dehāt abhyudgatam taraṇi maṇḍalam āviveśa
yena avakāśa viśarāru vimānam āsīt jvālā kalāpa jaṭilam kṣaṇam antarikṣam
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām karṇaparva
